name: Dream & Drive
description:
Try to reach your destination while getting more and more sleepy.

Controls:

Steer with  < A / D >
Fly with  < W / S >
Change volume with  < + / - >
Start Game with  < Left Click >

Here is a link to the project on Github: https://github.com/nheeb/dreamanddrive

(Credits for the used Sound Assets are also there)
